title: EU parliament gets Facebook answers after Zuckerberg meeting
text:
May 24, 2018 / 11:27 AM / Updated 7 hours ago EU parliament gets Facebook answers after Zuckerberg meeting Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BRUSSELS (Reuters) - The European Parliament distributed on Thursday what it called a first set of written replies from Facebook to oral questions put by lawmakers to CEO Mark Zuckerberg at a meeting in Brussels on Tuesday. FILE PHOTO: Facebook's CEO Mark Zuckerberg answers questions about the improper use of millions of users' data by a political consultancy, at the European Parliament in Brussels, Belgium, in this still image taken from Reuters TV May 22, 2018. REUTERS/ReutersTV
The replies had earlier been published by Facebook itself. For details, see the following Reuters story:. Reporting by Alastair Macdonald
